INSOMNEA art

Abyss_03 WIP

Abyss_03 is a roguelike escort mission game where you protect your spaceship from asteroids and gather biomass in order to fly home again.

The game is being developed in Unreal Engine 5 by a student team of one programmer, me and one other designer. We started developing the game in our fourth semester with the mission, not to create a complete, playable game but to experiment and try out new things as much as we could. And we did just that. The game is in a very early stage and the development will be continued at a later point in time.

My contributions to this project:

  • Game design lead
  • Character and spaceship concept art
  • Creating 3D assets
  • VFX

I created the concept art for our character as well as the spaceship. After that, I handed over the character concept art to our 3D artist and created the spaceship in 3D using Blender. The details like the label "03" were added in Krita. Finally, I placed the asset in Unreal Engine 5 into the scene.

For the thruster of the spaceship, I experimented with different methods. On the one hand, I tested the Niagara particle systems, and on the other hand, I created a simple cylinder with a blue fire texture mapped around it. In the end, we decided to go with the latter method, as it better matched our vision for the game.

After that I experimented with different variations of biomass shaders and wormholes. I had to learn that shaders and materials cannot be directly exported from Blender to Unreal Engine, so I looked for a solution directly in Unreal.

I also played around with shaders a bit, as we had originally agreed to use a PS1/pixel shader for our game. I also tried out a cel shader, but due to time constraints, none of the shaders made it into the current version of the game.
